venue.name: Cape Town International Convention Centre
venue.address_1: Convention Square 1 Lower Long St Cape Town

events.description:
Please make sure to register for this event on the link below and not just on meetup otherwise you will not be able to attend.

Cloud OnBoard Event

Cloud OnBoard is a one day training course, held on September 28
09:00 AM - 06:00 PM
Welcome Registration
Module 1 Introducing Google Cloud Platform
Module 2 Getting Started with Projects
Break
Module 3 Google Compute Engine
Module 4 Google Container Engine
Module 5 Google App Engine
Lunch
Module 6 Google Cloud Datastore & Cloud Storage
Module 7 Google Cloud SQL
Module 8 Google BigQuery
Module 9 Support and Resources

events.name: Machine Learning Fundamentals one day promotion Course R1500

events.name: Google Cloud Platform Fundamentals: Core Infrastructure
events.description:
Please register on https://events.withgoogle.com/core-infra-423211/

Google and Siatik invite you to this hands-on class to help introduce you to Google's Cloud Platform. Course description
This one-day instructor-led class provides an overview of Google Cloud Platform products and services. Through a combination of presentations, demos, and hands-on labs, participants learn the value of Google Cloud Platform and how to incorporate cloud-based solutions into business strategies.

Objectives
This course teaches participants the following skills:

Identify the purpose and value of each of the Google Cloud Platform products and services.

Interact with Google Cloud Platform services.

Describe ways in which customers have used Google Cloud Platform.

Choose among and use application deployment environments on Google Cloud Platform: App Engine, Container Engine, and Compute Engine.

Choose among and use Google Cloud Platform storage options: Cloud Storage, Cloud SQL, Cloud Bigtable, and Cloud Datastore.

Make basic use of BigQuery, Google’s managed data warehouse for analytics.

Make basic use of Cloud Deployment Manager, Google’s tool for creating and managing cloud resources through templates. Make basic use of Google Stackdriver, Google’s monitoring, logging, and diagnostics system.

Audience
This class is intended for:

Individuals planning to deploy applications and create application environments on Google Cloud Platform;

Developers, systems operations professionals, and solution architects getting started with Google Cloud Platform;

Executives and business decision makers evaluating the potential of Google Cloud Platform to address their business needs.

Prerequisites
Familiarity with the Linux command line, web servers, and text editors.

Delivery Method
Instructor-led, Instructor-led online

Duration
One day

What to bring
For this class, please bring:

Laptop (Windows, Mac OS or Linux)

Photo ID - needed for security

• What to bring

• Important to know

events.name: Working in a Serverless World
events.description:
Who buys servers any more ? Today we use serverless environments in the Cloud. Join us for the first GDG CLoud meetup of the year. Where we will explore the importance of serverless environments, joining us as speakers are Jan Krynauw CEO of Rezco Asset Management, Kimoon Kim Director Of Machine Learning at Siatik and Dries Cronje CEO of Deep Learning Cafe.

Our Keynote speak will be Jan Krynauw who prior to CEO of Rezco Asset Management co-led the investment consulting team at Old Mutual (at the time the largest investment consultancy in South Africa with a client base of USD 10B). Under Jan’s leadership the team was recognized with the prestigious group-wide ‘Innovation Award’. In his spare time Jan is an avid pianist and enjoys building Lego robotics with two sons. Jan is a qualified Actuary with 15 years industry experience and has a B.Sc Honours from University of Stellenbosch in Actuarial Science with a Computer Science overlay.

We are looking forward to seeing you all at WIGroup's Offices at 16:00 for an action packed GDG Cloud Meetup.

events.name: Google Cloud Platform Fundamentals: Big Data & Machine Learning
events.description: This one-day instructor-led course introduces participants to the big data capabilities of Google Cloud Platform. Through a combination of presentations, demos, and hands-on labs, participants get an overview of the Google Cloud platform and a detailed view of the data processing and machine learning capabilities. This course showcases the ease, flexibility, and power of big data solutions on Google Cloud Platform. Register by clicking on the link: https://events.withgoogle.com/fund-data-426250/

events.name: Event Driven Architecture, What is it? How does it work? and why is it important
events.description:
Join us at our next GDG meet up at the awesome Wigroup Offices in Cape Town - where Mogen Naidoo will be giving a talk on:
Event Driven Architecture (EDA)
1. Why is it important today?
2. What is it?
3. How it works?
4. Considerations and Transitioning to EDA
5. Linking EDA to Serverless Compute and Microservices
6. Where do I start with EDA?
Mogen Naidoo is Founder and Managing Director of IT Services company Qina Group (Pty) Ltd, Telecommunications company 316 Network Holdings (Pty) Ltd. and holds a position of Board of Directors on Fiat-Cryptocurrency trading platform African Coin Exchange. He is a recognized conference and public speaker to educators, non-profits, business and corporations. Much of his speaking engagements involves topics relevant to how the industry computes today, such as Cloud Computing, Big Data, Blockchain, AI, VR, AR. Robotics, Social Business, Mobility and Cyber Security. Mogen has extensive experience in Advisory, Analytics, Consulting, Research and Audit & Risk from his time at FNB, KPMG, IDC and Frost & Sullivan. Mogen holds a Master’s degree in Information Systems from the University of Cape Town.

We will end the evening off with some free drinks and Pizza's

events.name: Cloud Study Jam
events.description:
Join a community of like-minded developers and explore the latest Google Cloud technologies as a team.
Join us for our upcoming Cloud Study Jam and get hands-on experience with GCP Essentials with free access to Qwiklabs

After the Study Jam, you’ll receive 30-days free access to the entire Qwiklabs catalogue, so you can keep developing your skills at home. Complete all of the labs in the session’s quest, and you’ll earn an additional free month of access to Qwiklabs as well as a badge for your online profile.

Bring a laptop and charger (PC, Mac or Chromebook)! The labs will run on all of the latest versions of popular browsers. For the best experience, make sure your laptop has Firefox or Chrome installed. Don’t forget your charger.
Please click here to register for the event: https://forms.gle/5KFm1quxNrbazo3Q6

Agenda for Cloud Study Jam

10:00 am - 10:30 am - Introduction, set up and 1 minute walk through video
10:30 am - 11:15 am - A Tour of Qwiklabs and Google Cloud Platform
11:00 am - 11:40 am - Creating a virtual Machine
11:40 am - 12:30 am - Getting started with Cloud Shell and GCloud
12:30 pm - 1:00 pm - Pizza’s and drinks
1:00 pm - 1:30 pm - Kubernetes Engine Qwik start
1:30 pm - 2:15 pm - Set up Network and HTTP Load Balancers
End of session

Please feel free to message us on this meetup group regarding any questions you may have

group_profile.intro: Meetup up with other developers discussing google cloud technologies.
